channel.title: Calling All Cinema 4D Professionals!
channel.description:
So basically, I've been trying for hours to do this:
http://www.youtube.com/user/TehRedBull (The Normal 3D text to Wireframe)
I've searched Youtube for tutorials on how to do that but none of them show me how to do them together. If any of you C4D Pros can do this, please reply.
Thank, Seif

item.title: Calling All Cinema 4D Professionals!
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:2, topic:409420”]Background image wont load for me, but try render effects - cell render. Set the edge color and background color to whatever you want, and check outline and edges.[/quote]Kthx<3 Atleast that solves the wireframe part of the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Calling All Cinema 4D Professionals!
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Background image wont load for me, but try render effects - cell render. Set the edge color and background color to whatever you want, and check outline and edges.

Read full topic
